name: PowerCraft
short_description:
PowerCraft is the name of multiple projects in one. It's main purpose is to give Minecraft server owners power over their Bukkit/Vanilla Servers. PowerCraft currently comes in 2 forms:
PowerBukkit and PowerClassic.

PowerBukkit is a basic bukkitcraft server with a GUI and a set of standard plugins. Among these plugins plugins are Essentials, iZone, WorldEdit, and many more!

PowerClassic is a full classic Minecraft server. Not a wrapper. PowerClassic offers a large variety of features that many servers do and more!

The aim of PowerCraft Servers is to give the server owner ease of managment along with powerful tools for moderation and administration!
summary: PowerCraft are Minecraft Servers Both Classic and Regular.
